original: bod skad du /

analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i bstod pa rim pa gnyis pa /

original: rdo rje btsun mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: he ru ka dpal mchog tu rab dgyes pa'i //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal mchog tu rab dgyes pa'i //
translated: In the supreme delight of glorious Heruka,

original: 'o mtsho yid 'ong zla ba'i 'od byed ma //
analyzed: 'o mtsho yid 'ong zla ba'i 'od byed ma //
translated: You are the moon-like light of the ocean of milk,

analyzed: 'gyur med bde bas rnam sgeg lha mo yi // lhun grub dpal gyis bdag la skyong gyur cig / lha dang lha min gtsug gi nor bu yi //
translated: The goddess who dances with unchanging bliss.ğŸ”½With your spontaneous glory, protect me!ğŸ”½The garlands of light rays from the crest jewels

original: 'od zer tshogs rnams bstar ba'i phreng ba yis //ğŸ”½khyod zhabs chu skyes la ni nyer mchod pa'i //
analyzed: 'od zer tshogs rnams bstar ba'i phreng ba yis // khyod zhabs chu skyes la ni nyer mchod pa'i //
translated: Of gods and demigodsğŸ”½Worship your lotus feet.

original: dbang phyug mdzes mas bka' drin rab tu stsol //
analyzed: dbang phyug mdzes mas bka' drin rab tu stsol //
translated: O beautiful goddess, grant me your kindness!

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug rab stsol bas //ğŸ”½mchog tu gsal bar gar mdzad zhabs sen ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug rab stsol bas // mchog tu gsal bar gar mdzad zhabs sen ni //
translated: Grant me the supreme sovereignty of the three worlds!ğŸ”½Your toenails are always beautiful,

original: 'jam mnyen sor mo la mdzes rtag pa ru //
analyzed: 'jam mnyen sor mo la mdzes rtag pa ru //
translated: Soft and supple.

original: dgyes pas bdag gi spyi por gzhag tu gsol //
analyzed: dgyes pas bdag gi spyi por gzhag tu gsol //
translated: With delight, place them on my head!

original: rab gsal dri med dkyus ring spyan dag dang // snyan cha phyogs su 'khrol zhing 'dzum zhal can //
analyzed: rab gsal dri med dkyus ring spyan dag dang // snyan cha phyogs su 'khrol zhing 'dzum zhal can //
translated: Your eyes are clear, stainless, and long, and your earrings swing to and fro.

original: chu skyes dmar po'i mdangs gsal yum gyi gdong //
analyzed: chu skyes dmar po'i mdangs gsal yum gyi gdong //
translated: Your face is smiling, and your mother's face is radiant like a red lotus.

original: bdag gi mig la mngon sum mthong ba stsol //
analyzed: bdag gi mig la mngon sum mthong ba stsol //
translated: Grant me the gift of seeing you with my own eyes.

original: bdud bzhi'i khrag gis yongs gang ka p'a la //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i khrag gis yongs gang ka p'a la //
translated: Your left hand holds a skull-cup filled with the blood of the four maras,

original: rab dkar phyag g-yon padma la chags pa //
analyzed: rab dkar phyag g-yon padma la chags pa //
translated: and is attached to a lotus, which is very white.

original: yongs rdzogs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus //
translated: In the middle of two completely perfect sun-mandalas,

original: zla ba gzhon nu zhugs pa lta bur mdzes //
analyzed: zla ba gzhon nu zhugs pa lta bur mdzes //
translated: you are as beautiful as the rising moon.

original: lha rnams la ni khyed cag thogs med kyi //
analyzed: lha rnams la ni khyed cag thogs med kyi //
translated: To the gods, you are the one who gives relief,

original: blo ngan rnam par 'joms zhes dbugs dbyung phyir //
analyzed: blo ngan rnam par 'joms zhes dbugs dbyung phyir //
translated: saying, Destroy the evil thoughts of you all!

original: g-yas pas phyar ba'i gri gug gyen phyags par //
analyzed: g-yas pas phyar ba'i gri gug gyen phyags par //
translated: You are skilled in holding a curved knife raised in your right hand,

original: 'dzin mkhas khyod ni 'gro ba'i ma ma'o //ğŸ”½rab dmar byi ru'i phung po mngon mtho ba //
analyzed: 'dzin mkhas khyod ni 'gro ba'i ma ma'o // rab dmar byi ru'i phung po mngon mtho ba //
translated: and you are the grandmother of the world.ğŸ”½You are very red, like a heap of coral,

original: mu tig phreng bas yongs su dkris pa bzhin //
analyzed: mu tig phreng bas yongs su dkris pa bzhin //
translated: and are surrounded by a garland of pearls.

original: phyag rgya lnga yis sku la rab brgyan cing //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis sku la rab brgyan cing //
translated: Your body is completely adorned with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: nu 'bur rgyas pa do shal 'od kyis mdzes //
analyzed: nu 'bur rgyas pa do shal 'od kyis mdzes //
translated: Your full breasts are beautified by a necklace of light.

original: kun du 'gro ba'i sdig pa mun pa'i dpung //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba'i sdig pa mun pa'i dpung //
translated: The army of darkness, the sin that goes everywhere,ğŸ”½Is destroyed and scattered by the light

original: 'joms shing 'phro bas phyogs bcu kun khyab pa'i //ğŸ”½'od @127a * //
analyzed: 'joms shing 'phro bas phyogs bcu kun khyab pa'i // 'od @127a * //
translated: That radiates from you and pervades the ten directions.

original: zer tshogs rnams khyod kyis yangs 'dzin pa //
analyzed: zer tshogs rnams khyod kyis yangs 'dzin pa //
translated: You hold it all in your vast embrace

original: ma lus 'gro ba bsgral ba'i ched du lags //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba bsgral ba'i ched du lags //

original: gru mo'i kha tv'am rtser son thod pa ni //
analyzed: gru mo'i kha tv'am rtser son thod pa ni //

analyzed: 'ching grol bral las rdo rje'i gdan thob ces //
translated: Is said to be the vajra seat, free from bondage and liberation.

original: phreng bar brgyus pa'i mgo rnams dbugs btang nas //
analyzed: phreng bar brgyus pa'i mgo rnams dbugs btang nas //

original: lha mor 'khyud pas do shal byas pa bzhin ;
analyzed: lha mor 'khyud pas do shal byas pa bzhin ;

original: / gan rkyal bsgyel ba'i mo ro zhabs 'og na //
analyzed: / gan rkyal bsgyel ba'i mo ro zhabs 'og na //

analyzed: khyod la gyen du phyogs par blta ba ni // skyabs gzhan bral ba bdag la'ang khyod kyi 'od //

translated: Which are beautiful with a variety of jewels,ğŸ”½And you prefer the ornaments of human bone,

analyzed: rgyan mchog mi yi rus pa la bzhed na //

original: dgyes phyir rin chen 'bul na ji ltar 'gyur //

original: khyod zhal mngon par yid 'od gyur na ko //
analyzed: khyod zhal mngon par yid 'od gyur na ko //

analyzed: rab khros phag zhal g-yas su sngon 'di gang //

original: khyod sku rnam par sgeg pa'i tshul 'dzin na //
analyzed: khyod sku rnam par sgeg pa'i tshul 'dzin na //
translated: You have a body with a charming manner,ğŸ”½But you are naked, as if you were ashamed.

original: sgron ma g-yo med rab tu sbar ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sgron ma g-yo med rab tu sbar ba'i phyir //

original: bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs can gsang ba yi //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs can gsang ba yi //
translated: You, who are the inconceivable form, the secret,

original: chos 'byung snying po'i ze 'brur gnas pa khyod //
analyzed: chos 'byung snying po'i ze 'brur gnas pa khyod //
translated: Dwelling in the heart of the lotus of the source of phenomena,

original: rdo rje chu skyes spyong ba'i las kyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje chu skyes spyong ba'i las kyis ni //

analyzed: rang gnas las spyod lhun po'i khyim dag tu //

original: rtsol med 'bar ba'i glog gis 'khor lo gsum //
analyzed: rtsol med 'bar ba'i glog gis 'khor lo gsum //
translated: The three wheels are destroyed by the lightning of effortless blazing,

analyzed: bcom las rnam rtog klong 'khor tshogs zhi ma //

original: 'dod ma khyod kyi spyan sngar bkod pa yi //
analyzed: 'dod ma khyod kyi spyan sngar bkod pa yi //
translated: In front of you, O desired one,

original: mchod pa'i rgyan la mi gzigs rol mo'i sgra //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rgyan la mi gzigs rol mo'i sgra //
translated: The ornaments of offering are not seen, the sound of music

analyzed: mi gsan dri bzang mi snom bdud rtsi'i bcud //
translated: Is not heard, the sweet scent is not smelled, and the essence of nectar

analyzed: myang dang reg la'ang reg mi mdzad aa ye //
translated: Is not tasted or touched, O Aje.

original: de ni rang gi rje btsun nyid la khyod //
analyzed: de ni rang gi rje btsun nyid la khyod //

original: rjes su chags pa'i gzhan dbang gyur las te //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa'i gzhan dbang gyur las te //
translated: Under the power of passion,

original: de phyir khyod bsgoms pa las stong pa nyid //
analyzed: de phyir khyod bsgoms pa las stong pa nyid //
translated: Therefore, by meditating on you, emptiness

original: 'bras gyur bdag gi skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
analyzed: 'bras gyur bdag gi skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
translated: Is the result, and my birth is fruitful.

original: lhun po'i rtser son padma'i snal ma ltar //
analyzed: lhun po'i rtser son padma'i snal ma ltar //
translated: Like the stalk of a lotus,

original: phra ba'i sku yi 'od zer dus mtha'i mes //
analyzed: phra ba'i sku yi 'od zer dus mtha'i mes //
translated: The light rays of your subtle body, like the fire at the end of time,

original: @127b kun du bzang po 'jug pa'i nags bsregs nas //
analyzed: @127b kun du bzang po 'jug pa'i nags bsregs nas //
translated: Burn the forest of Samantabhadra's entry,

original: ri dbang po la mngon par phebs bzhin gnas //ğŸ”½rab 'bar rtse mo can gyis rgyu skar gyi //
analyzed: ri dbang po la mngon par phebs bzhin gnas // rab 'bar rtse mo can gyis rgyu skar gyi //
translated: And you remain, like one who has ascended Mount Meru.ğŸ”½The lord of the constellations, melted by the blazing summit,

original: bdag po bzhu ba las bab bdud rtsi'i char //
analyzed: bdag po bzhu ba las bab bdud rtsi'i char //
translated: Pours down a rain of nectar,

original: blugs gtor rgyun gyis rnam rtog bag chags bcas //
analyzed: blugs gtor rgyun gyis rnam rtog bag chags bcas //
translated: And with a continuous stream, the latent tendencies of conceptuality are removed,

original: ring dor bde chen zab mo'i rgya mtsho thim //
analyzed: ring dor bde chen zab mo'i rgya mtsho thim //
translated: And the distant ocean of profound great bliss dissolves.

original: dmigs med thugs rje can khyod yid bzhin gyi //
analyzed: dmigs med thugs rje can khyod yid bzhin gyi //
translated: You, the compassionate one without reference point, like a wish-fulfilling gem

original: nor bu dpag bsam shing ltar ri dbang las //ğŸ”½lus can kun la rtag tu 'bad med par //
analyzed: nor bu dpag bsam shing ltar ri dbang las // lus can kun la rtag tu 'bad med par //
translated: Or a wish-granting tree, from Mount MeruğŸ”½You constantly and effortlessly bestow

original: dga' dang dpal dang rtag bde sbyin par mdzad //
analyzed: dga' dang dpal dang rtag bde sbyin par mdzad //
translated: Joy, glory, and constant bliss upon all embodied beings.

original: skye 'jig dang bral chung du chen po dang // phyin ci log 'das shes rab thabs dag las //
analyzed: skye 'jig dang bral chung du chen po dang // phyin ci log 'das shes rab thabs dag las //
translated: Free from arising and ceasing, beyond the small and great, and beyond error, through wisdom and means,

original: rtag tu dga' ba dam pa rab 'bar bas //
analyzed: rtag tu dga' ba dam pa rab 'bar bas //
translated: The supreme joy always blazes.

original: bdag gi nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa choms //
analyzed: bdag gi nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa choms //
translated: I have destroyed the afflictive and cognitive obscurations.

original: rnam rnams gya gyu'i ngang tshul sdem po can //
analyzed: rnam rnams gya gyu'i ngang tshul sdem po can //
translated: The mind is a cage of crooked and tortuous ways.

original: tshom rkun lta bur rnam pa mang po'i don //
analyzed: tshom rkun lta bur rnam pa mang po'i don //
translated: It is like a thief, taking away the meaning of the many aspects.

original: nye bar len cing yul rnams za byed pa //
analyzed: nye bar len cing yul rnams za byed pa //
translated: It takes up and devours the objects.

original: de phyir sems la ci slad smod mi bgyid //ğŸ”½'on kyang 'gro spyod kun spangs stong nyid kyi //
analyzed: de phyir sems la ci slad smod mi bgyid // 'on kyang 'gro spyod kun spangs stong nyid kyi //
translated: Therefore, why should I not revile the mind?ğŸ”½However, having abandoned all worldly conduct,

original: khyim du ci dgar zhugs la bde ba che'o //
analyzed: khyim du ci dgar zhugs la bde ba che'o //
translated: I will enter the house of emptiness and be very happy.

original: mchog gi rol khyod ni rol gyur pa //
analyzed: mchog gi rol khyod ni rol gyur pa //
translated: O you who are the supreme play, you are playing.

original: ae ma'o sems 'di'i nyer len ma lags sam //
analyzed: ae ma'o sems 'di'i nyer len ma lags sam //
translated: Ah! Is this not the taking up of this mind?

original: gang tshe steng du song bas rnam gsum gyi //
analyzed: gang tshe steng du song bas rnam gsum gyi //
translated: When, having gone upward, the three

original: 'khor lo kun bsregs bde ba chen po ni //ğŸ”½bzhu zhing bkug las spros pa med pa yi //
analyzed: 'khor lo kun bsregs bde ba chen po ni // bzhu zhing bkug las spros pa med pa yi //
translated: wheels are completely burned, the great blissğŸ”½melts and is drawn up, and the goddess

original: lha mo rang gi gnas su yongs su zhugs //
analyzed: lha mo rang gi gnas su yongs su zhugs //
translated: enters her own place without emission.

original: de tshe rlung 'di'i rgyu ba gang du byed //
analyzed: de tshe rlung 'di'i rgyu ba gang du byed //
translated: At that time, where does the movement of this wind occur?

original: dbang po phyin ci log pa'ang gang du 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang po phyin ci log pa'ang gang du 'gyur //
translated: Where does the perversion of the sense faculties occur?

original: kun nas gya gyu'i sems ni gang du g-yo //
analyzed: kun nas gya gyu'i sems ni gang du g-yo //
translated: Where does the crooked mind move?

original: yul la longs spyod tshul kyang gang du 'gyur //ğŸ”½bgo ba dang bral mi rus rgyan du byas //
analyzed: yul la longs spyod tshul kyang gang du 'gyur // bgo ba dang bral mi rus rgyan du byas //
translated: How can you enjoy objects?ğŸ”½You are naked, adorned with bone ornaments,

original: rol gnas shing thod pa'i snod 'chang ba //
analyzed: rol gnas shing thod pa'i snod 'chang ba //
translated: You live in a charnel ground, and you hold a skull cup.

original: dngos po bral bas stong par zhugs de'i phyir //
analyzed: dngos po bral bas stong par zhugs de'i phyir //
translated: You have entered emptiness, free of things.

original: mi 'chi las gzhan khyod la dngos ci blang //ğŸ”½'on tang 'gro kun rga shi'i 'jigs pa ni //
analyzed: mi 'chi las gzhan khyod la dngos ci blang // 'on tang 'gro kun rga shi'i 'jigs pa ni //
translated: Therefore, O Death, what else can you take from me?

original: 'joms shing skyong ba'i dam bca' bsnyems ma kye //
analyzed: 'joms shing skyong ba'i dam bca' bsnyems ma kye //
translated: But still, you are the one who destroys and protects all beings from the fear of old age and death.

original: bdag kyang rnal 'byor che la shes rab thabs //
analyzed: bdag kyang rnal 'byor che la shes rab thabs //
translated: I too am a great yogi, with wisdom and means.

original: brtan las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: brtan las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub stsol //
translated: Grant me the great seal siddhi from a steadfast one.

original: khyod la dad pas bstod par rab brtson pa //
analyzed: khyod la dad pas bstod par rab brtson pa //
translated: I am striving to praise you with faith.

original: blo dman bdag gi nongs sam nyes med sring //
analyzed: blo dman bdag gi nongs sam nyes med sring //
translated: Please forgive any faults of mine, of little intelligence, or any mistakes.

original: gang phyir khyod nyid 'gro ba'i mgon gyur slad //
analyzed: gang phyir khyod nyid 'gro ba'i mgon gyur slad //
translated: Since you yourself are the protector of beings,

original: nongs na'ang mchog gi ma mas bzod par rigs //
analyzed: nongs na'ang mchog gi ma mas bzod par rigs //
translated: it is fitting that you, the supreme mother, forgive even my faults.ğŸ”½Whatever stainless virtue I have gained

original: khyod la bstod pa'i dge ba dri med gang zhig ni //
analyzed: khyod la bstod pa'i dge ba dri med gang zhig ni //
translated: from praising you,

original: bdag gis thob pa de yis srog chags phung po rnams //
analyzed: bdag gis thob pa de yis srog chags phung po rnams //
translated: may that cause the mass of living beings

original: @128a * // mi dman rab dga'i dga' bas rtag tu snying gtams nas //
analyzed: @128a * // mi dman rab dga'i dga' bas rtag tu snying gtams nas //
translated: May my heart always be filled with the joy of supreme delight,ğŸ”½and may I attain the sublime spiritual attainment of the Great Seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dam pa rnyed gyur cig / rdo rje phag mo'i bstod pa rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dam pa rnyed gyur cig / rdo rje phag mo'i bstod pa rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba /
translated: This praise of Vajravarahi, called the Two Stages,

original: rdo rje btsun mo 'di nyid kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo 'di nyid kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: was composed by the lord of adepts, the great Indian pandita of the east, Shri Varnarata, who was directly blessed by this very Vajra Queen.

original: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang / chos 'khor lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyis 'bras yul nor bu'i gling du bsgyur ba las /
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang / chos 'khor lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyis 'bras yul nor bu'i gling du bsgyur ba las /
translated: It was translated by the great pandita himself and the Dharma lord, the translator Jampal Yeshi, in the Jewel Island of Drayspil.

original: phyis mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen pa dang dad pa rnam par dkar ba'i lugs gnyis kyi dbang phyug dam pa aa mo gha siddhi sa bkas gnang ba las /
analyzed: phyis mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen pa dang dad pa rnam par dkar ba'i lugs gnyis kyi dbang phyug dam pa aa mo gha siddhi sa bkas gnang ba las /
translated: Later, by the command of the holy lord of the two systems of knowledge and pure faith, Amogha Siddhi,
